keywords.value: Adolf Hitler: His Life and His Speeches (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works

lead_paragraph: Documents about a biography published two years before “Mein Kampf” and credited to an aristocrat suggest that Hitler had designs on power earlier than historians have thought.

headline.print_headline: Hitler Wrote 1923 Book Praising Him, Scholar Says
headline.main: Early Book Praising Hitler May Have Been Written by Hitler

snippet: Documents about a biography published two years before “Mein Kampf” and credited to an aristocrat suggest that Hitler had designs on power earlier than historians have thought....
abstract: Research suggests Adolf Hitler was true author of Adolf Hitler: His Life and His Speeches, 1923 biography credited to German aristocrat Baron Adolf Victor von Koerber; finding shows Hitler had launched his campaign to take power earlier than historians had previously believed.
